pButton.Name: Argument Essay
pButton.popInfo: 1. Restate the thesis. 2. Restate the argument. 3. Encourage the audience to do something.

pButton.Name: Analysis Essay
pButton.popInfo: 1. Restate the thesis. 2. Leave the audience with a clear understanding of your thesis.

pButton.Name: Comparison Essay
pButton.popInfo: 1. Restate the thesis. 2. Summarize the main points. 3. Make the comparison/contrast meaningful or important.

pButton.Name: Cause-Effect Essay
pButton.popTitle: In a cause and effect essay:
pButton.popInfo: 1. Restate the thesis. 2. Review the main supporting points. 3. Make a connection (Because of that, this should occur).

pButton.Name: Research Paper
pButton.popInfo: 1. Restate the thesis. 2. Add a statement about what you learned.

pButton.Name: Business Letter
pButton.popInfo: 1. Restate the thesis. 2. Provide contact information.
